SearchDoubles Functions

Function to cross correlate with Gaia and Wds.

find_single_stars.query_the_gaia(objloc, conerad, catalognamelist=['I/350/gaiaedr3', 'B/wds'], RUWE=True, maghigh=3, maglow=10)

This function will query the input list of catalogs using the Astropy Vizier API.

Parameters

  • catalognamelist (list) – List of catalog name strings as shown on Vizier.

  • "I/350/gaiaedr3" (Ex.) –

  • objloc (string) – RA/Dec coordinate pair to pass into Vizier.query_region().

  • 35.667131796" (Ex. "11 02 24.8763629208 -77 33) –

  • conerad (float) – Cone radius in degrees.

Returns

_description_

Return type

_type_
